duties_responsibilities.duty: Establish and lead the strategic direction for safety and environmental programs to ensure compliance with all laws and regulations.
Design and oversee the EH&S management system, annual plans, programs/policies/procedures, and auditing.
Manage Hazardous Waste program, including proper handling, removal, and compliance.
Represent EH&S matters to stakeholders and identify the impact of emerging issues on operations.
Manage site day-to-day HSE field compliance, EH&S site audits, and ensure site leadership and associates are trained and knowledgeable.
Prepare and oversee the EH&S budget and incident investigation programs company-wide.
Ensure timely and accurate reporting of required submissions and corporate reporting data.
Travel to ZEISS offices throughout the U.S./Canada (approximately 25%)

education_certification.credential: B. S. in Scientific, Engineering, Safety and Environmental or technical discipline with 5+ years of relevant experience and 3+ years of direct supervision experience
